question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central. Is the destination within sight at your current location? If yes, where is the destination in your view?  
choose:  
A. The stairs in front of the central ALL-STAR cafe are currently in the center of my field of view.  
B. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are currently in the upper left corner of my field of view.  
C. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are not within my field of view.  
D. The stairs in front of ALL-STAR Cafe in Central are currently on the right side of my field of view.  
E. The stairs in front of the central ALL-STAR cafe are currently at the bottom of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the street and buildings, but there are no stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central visible in the field of view. The frames provided do not show the specific destination within sight.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 7)]
Option: [C]
Reason: From the initial position (0-7 seconds), the view shows a wide street scene with buildings and trees. The stairs in front of the Central ALL-STAR Cafe are not visible in this initial field of view.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial position shows a view of the street and buildings, but there are no stairs in front of the ALL-STAR Cafe in Central visible in the field of view. The frames provided do not show the specific destination within sight.
